00230    class const_iterator :
00231       public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag,
00232                            MC2Coordinate >
00233    {
00234    public:
00235       const_iterator( const GfxPolygon& poly,
00236                       int pos ) : m_poly( &poly ), m_pos( pos ),
00237                                   m_lastUpdatedPos( -1 ) {
00238          
00239       }
00240       
00241       const_iterator& operator++() {
00242          // Must update the old coord
00243          updateCoord();
00244          ++m_pos;
00245          return *this;
00246       }
00247 
00248       void updateCoord() {
00249          if ( m_pos != m_lastUpdatedPos ) {
00250             MC2Coordinate lastCoord ( m_coord );
00251             m_coord.lat = m_poly->getLat( m_pos, lastCoord.lat );
00252             m_coord.lon = m_poly->getLon( m_pos, lastCoord.lon );
00253             m_lastUpdatedPos = m_pos;
00254          } 
00255       }
00256             
00257       const MC2Coordinate& operator*() const {
00258          // Heh
00259          const_cast<const_iterator*>(this)->updateCoord();
00260          return m_coord;
00261       }
00262       
00263       const MC2Coordinate* operator->() const {
00264          // Update coordinate.
00265          this->operator*();
00266          return &m_coord;
00267       }
00268       
00269       bool operator!=( const const_iterator& other ) const {
00270          return ( m_pos != other.m_pos ) || ( m_poly != other.m_poly );
00271       }
00272       
00273       bool operator==( const const_iterator& other ) const {
00274          return !(*this != other );
00275       }
00276    private:
00277       const GfxPolygon* m_poly;
00278       int m_pos;
00279       int m_lastUpdatedPos;
00280       MC2Coordinate m_coord;
00281    };
00282 
00283    const_iterator begin() const {
00284       return const_iterator( *this, 0 );
00285    }
00286 
00287    const_iterator end() const {
00288       return const_iterator( *this, getNbrCoordinates() );
00289    }
